dynex.description: API key for accessing the DynexCoin platform.

google_drive.description: OAuth2 credentials for accessing the user's Google Drive.

custom_ai_service.description: API key for accessing the custom AI processing services.

usage_limits.description: Defines API request limits and the maximum allowed Google Drive storage usage per user.

pricing.description: Pricing structure for extra requests or overage fees, ensuring profitability.

support.description: Support contact email for handling user inquiries or issues.

metadata.description: This file stores sensitive API keys, usage limits, pricing, and support configurations.
